entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New `--os` argument for `dotnet restore` #37245
    8.0.2xx
  • Published ConsoleApp with AOT throws error /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.29' not found #37240
  • add output format support for dotnet tool list command #37239
  • In Progress: Ideas for `dotnet tool update --all` #37237

Closed

  • [workloads] dotnet verify fails on 7.0.401 on some Windows machines #36270
  • `dotnet watch` broken in `8.0.100` #36918
  • dotnet watch test cannot configure output in .NET 8.0 #37244
  • Unexpected compile error #31691

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #37252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for test, build and other commands. #37233
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Use .NET 9.0 versions for task dependencies #37013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix install state file for MSI based installs #37223
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2326552 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37072
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create dummy AfterSdkPublish target Fixes #26710 #36850
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Disable Source Link in desktop WPF temp projects #37164
    Servicing-consider, Area-SourceLink
